comment.body: It's likely just coloration based on the public key. The same thing has been done on other zeronet sites, like ZeroTalk.
Does it grab whatever hubs people are using, or is it all hardcoded+seeds? Automatically grabbing hubs that people are using would help solve the problem for good.

Awesome. I fiddled around with it, and unless there's the hubs hiding somewhere I didn't look, it indeed looks like it's pulling them automatically. And yea, I edited the python script to fix the bug.
@Jayofthezero: You still have to do the manual work. That page is just a clone of the ZeroMe 'create profile' page, just with more hubs by default.
